response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. After careful consideration, we have decided to offer this product to you at a special price of $950,000. We are confident that this offer represents a fair valuation and an exceptional opportunity for both parties. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction with excellent customer service and support throughout the process. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
